name: Melvin's Incredible Voyage
description:
Melvin's Incredible Voyage is a silly jumping game. Melvin is a melon. He is facing a crisis due to humans wanting to eat his delicious innards. So he has concocted a plan to escape from his demise. He will train hard to jump as high as he can, and eventually, jump off the planet in hopes of finding another one suitable to live on.

Help Melvin in his quest. Unlock his supermelonal skills and travel with him across the galaxy.

Good luck!
